translations: n.虚拟估算虚拟值（imputation 的复数形式）；归罪；罪名（imputation 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: I won't remain supperless, even though you refute every one of my imputations.
sentences.translation: 即使你驳倒了我每一句话，但我终究要吃晚餐的！

sentences.sentence: I have been too long accustomed to hear imputations and calumnies thrown out upon great and honorable characters, to be much influenced by them.
sentences.translation: 长期以来，我已习惯于听到对于伟大、高尚的人物的诋毁、中伤，已不再受其影响了。

sentences.sentence: The nature and intension of the contracts law are the cornerstone of the imputations of contracts liability, which serves the achievement of its own function.
sentences.translation: 合同责任性质和内涵界定是合同责任归责的基础，合同归责服务于其功能的实现。
